text: God gɨn damuamin bizim, Devit a gɨfo, a Gumazir God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezim, Krais, an aremegh ua dɨkavamin bizim mɨgei. Egha ghaze, God aneteghtɨma an ariaghrezibar tongɨn mozimɨn aven ikian kogham. Egh an nivafɨzim kurighan kogham.(2:31) Grighɨn akam me ghaze, “Krais”, an mɨngarim God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim.
